TITLE: Sustainable Development Goals
DEF: Seventeen interconnected objectives aimed at promoting sustainable development, formulated by the UN General Assembly
TASK: The Sustainable Development Goals pattern aims to incorporate global targets addressing social, economic, and environmental issues into the curriculum. It's useful for fostering global awareness, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills among learners. The main challenge lies in incorporating these complex goals into diverse curriculums without overwhelming learners. Effectively deploying this pattern involves integrating relevant goals into lessons, project-based learning, and perhaps leveraging AI to provide current, real-world data on these issues.
